mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME productName, PRODUCT.UNIT_PRICE unitPrice, PRODUCT.UNIT unit, PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION description, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID productId, CART_DETAIL.QUANTITY quantity, IMAGE.IMAGE_FILE imgFileMain FROM BRN_CART_DETAIL as CART_DETAIL, BRN_PRODUCT as PRODUCT LEFT JOIN BRN_IMAGE as IMAGE ON IMAGE.ID = PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID AND IMAGE.SEQ = 1 WHERE CART_DETAIL.PRODUCT_ID = PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID AND CART_DETAIL.CART_ID = #{cartId} AND CART_DETAIL.DEL_FLG = 0
